alert.note: Alert for Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Tallapoosa County through 545 PM CDT... At 501 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Goldville to near Nixburg. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Dadeville, Jacksons` Gap, New Site, Goldville, Hillabee Creek, Eastern Lake Martin, Western Lake Martin, Northern Lake Martin, Wind Creek State Park, Southern Lake Martin, Daviston, Susannah Crossing, Maxwell Gunter Recreation Area, Horseshoe Bend National Military Park, Hackneyville, Dare Park, Eagle Creek and Horseshoe Bend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for east central Alabama.
